infosSupplementaires.description: This conceptual data model (MCD) outlines the database architecture for a comprehensive e-commerce platform. It structures the complete user journey, from product browsing (using categories, stock, and characteristics) to a persistent shopping cart (PANIER) and a full order fulfillment pipeline (COMMANDE), including payment and delivery tracking.

This Logical Data Model (MLD) translates the conceptual e-commerce model into a concrete relational database schema. It defines all tables, establishes primary keys and foreign keys to build relationships, and resolves all many-to-many associations into dedicated junction tables. This model is fully normalized and ready for SQL implementation.
The final design of the website, developed using the Laravel framework. The site prioritizes a strong visual identity and intuitive ergonomics to ensure a high-quality user experience.
